La actividad que realiza Marvel es el alquiler de juegos de videos, para lo cual instaló en su casa un pequeño local contando con todos los permisos y licencias de ley, donde solo se permite el ingreso de mayores de edad. Tiene 18 años realizando esta actividad, logrando con el tiempo hacerlo crecer. Por otro lado tiene una tienda donde vende golosina, en ella sus hijos lo apoyan en la atención al publico. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es el buen ambiente que se tiene, y el atender a sus clientes muy amablemente. Por otro lado, lo que no le gusta es el desorden que por momentos se ocasiona cuando se llena su local, además de los ingresos económicos que le permiten solventar los gastos de su hogar. Por otro lado tiene planes de cambiar su negocio y abrir una librería y bazar en su propia casa. Este será el préstamo número 3 con la institución MFP, Por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado de 2500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de nuevos controles para su videos juegos, y golosinas al por mayor y en variedad para surtir su negocio.
texts.en:
Marvel, age 49, is a hardworking and dynamic woman who has the desire to succeed. She is in a common-law relationship with Bernardo. Marvel and her partner live comfortably with their four children (ages 24, 21, 19, and 14) in their own home. She rents out video games and has a small arcade in her home that has all of the legal permits and licenses, which only allow adults to enter her business. Marvel has been in business for 18 years and has been able to grow her venture. She also has a store where she sells candy, which is a place where children are allowed. Marvel enjoys her business because it is a good environment for her. She provides friendly service to her customers. On the other hand, she dislikes having to deal with the occasional moments of disorder that occur when there are too many people on her premises. The income she earns enables her to cover the household expenses. She has plans to change businesses and open a bookstore or a bazaar in her home.

This will be her third loan with the MFP organization. Marvel hopes that this small loan will help her accomplish her goals. The amount of 2500 PEN that she requested will be invested in the purchase of new video game controllers and bulk amounts of various candies to restock her business.

loans.use: to buy video game controllers and bulk amounts of various candies.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es:
Tomas nació en la comunidad de Pachar y vive en la misma comunidad donde nació, él tiene 41 años de edad y es soltero y aun no tiene hijos.  

Tomas desarrolla sus actividades cotidianas y económicas en la ciudad de Pachar, él se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado. Ya son diez años que se dedica al  negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

Tomas requiere el préstamo para comprar un ganado.  
 
Tomas se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma. Tomas pertenece al banco comunal “Inmaculada Concepción de Pachar” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Tomas was born in the town of Pachar, where he still lives. He is 41 years old and single and doesn't have any children.

Tomas carries out his daily and business activities in Pachar. He's been buying and selling cattle for 10 years now, and it's going very well, thanks to the effort he puts into the work.

Tomas needs this loan to buy another cow.

Tomas is grateful for the opportunity he's been offered and is committed to paying off his loan as scheduled. Tomas is a member of the "Inmaculada Concepción de Pachar" village bank, a client of the Asociación Arariwa in the city of Urubamba.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Aleja

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”HUCHUY QOSQO”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Lamay en la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Aleja;  La socia tiene 38 años de edad, la socia es casada, la socia tiene 4 hijos de 20, 17, 11, 5 meses de edad; la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de calzados, la socia tiene un stand en Calca en el exhibe sus diferentes calzados para damas, caballeros, niños, la socia trae de la ciudad del Cusco al por mayor y los vende en su stand, ella abre todos los días excepto los domingos porque desea pasar con sus familia, la socia es una mujer muy trabajadora y se esfuerza mucho para sacar adelante su hogar, ella administra la economía y distribuye los refrigerios y pasajes para todos en casa, la socia suele viajar cada 15 o 30 días para Cusco muy temprano por la mañana para traer la mercadería. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir el pago total de su mercadería y de este modo poder implementar para tener listos en la feria navideña.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "HUCHUY QOSQO” communal bank.  The communal  bank is located in the district of Lamay in the province of Calca and department of Cusco.

The member is Señora Aleja.  She is 38 years old and married.  She has four children, aged 20, 17, 11 and 5 months.  The member works buying and selling shoes; she has a stall in Calca where she displays a variety of shoes for women, men and children.  The member gets the shoes at wholesale in the city of Cusco, and sells them at her stall.  She is open daily except for Sundays, which she wants to spend with her family.

The member is a very hard-working woman who puts in great effort to move her family ahead in life.  She manages the finances for her household, and distributes snacks and tickets for everyone in her home.  The member usually travels to Cusco once or twice a month to get her merchandise, leaving very early in the morning.  

The member is requesting the loan to invest in full payment for her merchandise, and in this way to be able to put in place what she needs to be ready for the Christmas holidays.

The member is grateful for the loan and agrees to comply with her repayments in accordance with the repayment schedule..

loans.use: to invest in full payment for her merchandise, and in this way to be able to put in place what she needs to be ready for the Christmas holidays.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.en:
Svetlana is a married mom of two children and a successful entrepreneur, too. 

She sells women's clothing merchandise in one of the Novaya Kahovka malls called "Central." Svetlana has assorted inventory and always tries to introduce unique items to her selection of products to keep a stable position in the market competition. Svetlana has been in this business for 11 years. 

Currently, she has 26,000 UAH in working capital. Her net profit amounts to 5,000 UAH. Svetlana is seeking a loan of 20,000 UAH to increase assorted merchandise. Svetlana is a very energetic person. She finds time for family, business and personal growth.

loans.use: to increase assorted merchandise,

loans.name: Tita Paula

texts.es:
Tita Paula tiene 33 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene 1 hija y 1 hijo, vive con el esposo y con los dos hijos de 10 y 9 años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.
La VRC JERUSALEN, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto El caimito, Perteneciente a la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores Agrícolas de ciclo Corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol Gandul.
Tita se dedica a la Agricultura a la siembra de maíz hace 11 años. Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en Ventanas.
Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, fertilizantes, abonos. Con la ayuda del préstamo podrá comprar más insumos. El sueño es poder tener un terreno, no se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema. En el tiempo libre le gusta dedicarse a la iglesia.

Con el crédito anterior invirtio en la agricultura, la situación de la familia ha mejorado, los ingresos han sido más notorios porque puede aportar en el beneficio de la familia.
texts.en:
Tita Paula is 33 years old. She has a common-law husband, one son and one daughter. She lives with her husband and the two children, aged 10 and 9, in the canton of Ventanas, in Los Rios province.

The "JERUSALEN" communal bank is located in the district of El Caimito, which belongs to Puerto Pechiche parish in the canton of Pueblo Viejo. The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, planting corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Tita has worked in agriculture for 11 years, planting corn. She makes her purchases and sales in Ventanas.

She is requesting the loan to buy seeds, compost and fertilizers. With the help of the loan, she will be able to buy more supplies. Her dream is to be able to have a piece of land. She has not faced any type of problem. In her free time, she likes to dedicate herself to the church. 

With the previous loan, which she invested in agriculture, her family's situation has improved. The increased income has been most significant, because she has been able to contribute to her family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost and fertilizers.

loans.name: Duo Panimabey Group

texts.es: Duo Panimabey. este duo esta integrado por dos personas luchadoras que dia a dia se esfuerzan por salir adelante,en su negocio,Doña Delia tiene 5 hijos en edad escolar ella se dedica a la elavoracion D. tejidos tipicos,desD. hace años,ella nos  esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. materia prima para la confeccion D. tejidos tipicos, para seguir con su negocio y seqguir dandoles a sus hijos lo nesesario,
texts.en:
Duo Panimabey. This duo is composed of two people, fighters who day by day make an effort to get ahead in their business. Delia has 5 school-aged children, and she has worked at making typical weavings for many years. 

She is asking us for this loan to buy the raw material to make typical weavings, to continue with her business and continue giving her children what they need.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make weavings.

loans.name: Basilio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal ”HUCHUY QOSQO”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Lamay en la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Basilio;  El socio tiene 56 años de edad, El socio es casado, El socio tiene 4 hijos de 20, 17, 11, 5 meses de edad; el socio trabaja de forma independiente y también en la agricultura, el socio tiene terrenos de cultivos  de maíz, hortalizas, el socio tiene su stand de compra y venta de calzados junto con su conyugue, ambos trabajan en la venta de calzado para damas, caballeros y niños, y en esta ocasión el socio desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de calzados de temporada y como se viene las fiestas navideñas ellos invertirán un fuerte capital para comprar mercadería y abastecer a sus clientes. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de calzados al por mayor.

El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the ”HUCHUY QOSQO” communal bank.  The communal bank is located in the Lamay district in the province of Calca and department of Cusco.

The member is Señor Basilio; he is 56 years old and married.  He has four children, aged 20, 17, 11 and 5 months.  The member works for himself, and also works in farming.  He has farmland with corn and vegetable crops.  The member has a stand where he buys and sells shoes with his wife.  They both work selling shoes for women, men and children.  

On this occasion, the member wants to invest the loan in purchasing seasonal shoes, as the Christmas holidays are approaching.  They will invest a large amount of capital in purchasing merchandise and stocking up for his customers.  The member is requesting the loan to invest in purchasing shoes at wholesale.

The member is grateful for the loan and agrees to comply with making his repayments in accordance with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to invest in purchasing shoes at wholesale.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal ”HUCHUY QOSQO”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Lamay en la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Daniel;  El socio tiene 29 años de edad, El socio es conviviente, El socio tiene 3 hijos de 10, 6, 3 años de edad; el socio es maestro de obras y trabaja para el instituto de Cultura, I.N.C; el socio  tiene también terrenos agrícolas, en los que produce papa, maíz, maizal, el socio requiere el préstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas para sembrar, el comprara maíz, y alquilara un terreno para sembrar. El socio desea el crédito para alquilar un terreno y sembrar maíz.


El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the ”HUCHUY QOSQO” communal bank. This communal bank is located in the district of Lamay, in the province of Calca, department of Cusco.

His name is Daniel, and he is 29 years old. He has a live-in partner and 3 children, aged 10, 6 and 3. He is a master builder, and he works for the Institute of Culture, I.N.C. He also has agricultural lands where he produces potatoes and different types of corn. The borrower needs the loan to invest in buying seeds to plant. He will buy corn and rent a plot of land to plant it. The borrower wants the loan to rent a plot of land and plant corn. 

He is grateful for the loan and is committed to making his payments on schedule.

loans.use: to rent a plot of land and plant corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more body cream and groundnuts for her business.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.es: Julieta, de 20 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, con deseos de superación, es conviviente con Raúl que es empleado en una empresa privada, vive en compañía de su pareja y su hijo de 1 año de edad a los que quiere mucho, habitando en su casa propia. La actividad que realizará Julieta será la venta de artículos de vestir femeninos como zapatos, zapatillas, carteras, relojes, medias, prendas intimas. Este negocio se inicio por recomendación de su madre, es así que ofrece a familiares, amistades y amigas, de manera personal y entregando a pedido. Lo que le gusta de esa actividad es que podrá contar con tiempo para dedicarlo a su hijo menor, además de contar con ingreso adicional para apoyar a su pareja en los gastos del hogar, así como el sentirse ocupada y productiva. Este será el primer préstamo con la institución MFP, Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Además de sentirse bien con su banco comunal, pues conoce a la mayoría de sus miembros que son sus vecinos y los considera personas responsable. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá  en su nuevo negocio en la compra de productos de femeninos como zapatos y carteras.
texts.en:
Julieta, age 20, is a hardworking and earnest woman who has the desire to succeed. She is in a common-law relationship with Raúl, who is employed at a private company. Julieta and her partner have a one-year-old son who they love dearly. They live in their own home.

Julieta sells women’s accessories such as shoes, slippers, purses, watches, hosiery, and lingerie. She started this business because of her mother’s suggestion and now she offers products to relatives, loved ones, and friends. Julieta visits her customers in person and takes their orders. What she likes about this business is that it gives her time to spend with her young son. In addition, she is able to earn additional income to help her partner with the household expenses. The work also keeps her busy and productive.

This will be her first loan with MFP organization. Julieta hopes that this assistance will enable her to complete her plans. In addition, she feels good about her Communal Bank because she knows most of the members since they are neighbors who she considers to be responsible people. The amount of 1000 PEN that she requested will be invested in the purchase of women’s accessories such as shoes and purses.

loans.use: to buy shoes and purses for women.

loans.name: Jakeline

texts.es:
Jakeline nació en la ciudad de Lima y vive en la comunidad de Pachar, ella tiene 43 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos.  

Jakeline desarrolla sus actividades cotidianas y económicas en la ciudad de Pachar, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos y otras cosas más. Ya son diez años que se dedica al  negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

Jakeline requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería  como por ejemplo, fideos, tarros de leche, conservas, sacos de azúcar, sacos de arroz y otras cosas más.

Jakeline se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma. Jakeline pertenece al banco comunal “Inmaculada Concepción de Pachar” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Jakeline was born in the city of Lima and lives in the community of Pachar. She is 43 years old and has a common-law husband, with whom she has four children.  

Jakeline carries out her daily and economic activities in the city of Pachar. Her work is selling staple goods such as rice, sugar, noodles and other products. She has operated this business for ten years, and it is going very well for her thanks to the dedication she puts into her work. 

Jakeline needs the loan to buy merchandise such as noodles, canned milk, canned goods, sacks of rice and sugar, and other products. 

Jakeline is grateful for the opportunity provided to her in this way, and she is committed to making her payments on schedule. Jakeline belongs to the  “Inmaculada Concepción de Pachar” ["Immaculate Conception of Pachar"] communal bank of the Arariwa Association in the city of Urubamba.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as noodles, canned milk, canned goods, sacks of sugar and rice, and other items.

loans.name: Noelia Beatriz

texts.es:
NOELIA
casada  y madre de 3 hijos, viendo la necesidad económica,  se inicio en el negocio de venta y destaza de pollo,  empezó hace 5 años vendiendo de manera ambulante,  y gracias a Dios pudo obtener varios clientes en su vecindad,  con las ganancias generadas de su negocio y el apoyo de su esposo, abrió en su domicilio una pequeña tienda  donde vende productos comestibles de consumo diario como frijol arroz huevos jabon etc,desde hace 2 años, es una mujer trabajadora que desde temprano realiza la destaza de pollos y  a la vez atiende  la venta de consumo diario, ahora ya no sale a ofrecer si no que sus clientes la visitan. Su sueño a plazo corto es la mejora de su vivienda  por que sus hijos van creciendo, y tienen nuevas necesidades,el creditor que esta solicitando es para la compra de productos comestibles,como frijol,arroz maiz huevos javon aguas gaceosas, para obtener así una mejor entrada económica y cumplir su sueño y seguir perseverando como una  mujer luchadora.
texts.en: Noelia is married and has three children, driven by her financial needs she began selling and butchering chicken five years ago and thankfully she was able to get clients from her neighborhood and with the income earned and her husband’s support, two years ago she opened a small store from her house where she sells groceries for daily consumption, such as beans, rice, eggs, soap, etc. She is a hard-working woman that starts working early to cut up the chicken while also servicing the store, now she doesn’t have to go find clients because they come to her.  Her short term dream is to improve her house because her children are growing and they have different needs, the loan requested is to buy groceries (beans, rice, corn, ham, soda) to obtain higher revenues and achieve her dream persevering as a hard working woman.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, corn, etc.

loans.name: Eduviges

texts.es:
Eduviges nació en la ciudad de Cusco y vive en la comunidad de Pachar, ella tiene 43 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene diez hijos.  

Eduviges desarrolla sus actividades cotidianas y económicas en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo, ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza y chicha de jora. Ya son varios años que se dedica al  negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

Eduviges requiere el préstamo para comprar más jora de maíz y unas cuantas cajas de cerveza. 

Eduviges se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma. Eduviges pertenece al banco comunal “Inmaculada Concepción de Pachar” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Eduviges was born in the city of Cusco and lives in the Pachar community.  She is 43 years old and is married; she has ten children from this beautiful relationship.

Eduviges undertakes her daily activities and her economic activities in the city of Ollantaytambo.  She works selling beer and chicha de jora (a typical Peruvian drink made from fermented corn).  She has been working in the business for several years already, and it has been going very well for her due to the effort that she puts into her work.

Eduviges is requesting the loan to purchase more corn jora and several cases of beer.

Eduviges is grateful for the opportunity being provided to her by this means, and also agrees to comply with her repayments according to the schedule.  Eduviges belongs to the “Inmaculada Concepción de Pachar” communal bank, which is part of Asociación Arariwa and is in the city of Urubamba.

loans.use: to buy more corn jora (a fermented drink) and several cases of beer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es: Humberto, de 59 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y empeñoso, además de sociable y alegre está casado con Dora, vive en compañía de sus dos últimos hijos de 14 y 1 años, instalados cómodamente en su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Humberto es la agricultura, para eso cuenta con un terreno propio de 25 hectáreas de extensión donde siembra naranjas, toronjas, limones, mandarinas, camu camu y otros cítricos, dedicándose a ésta actividad desde hace 40 años. Cuenta con la ayuda de 5 peones para el cultivo y las temporadas de cosechas. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es el estar en contacto con la naturaleza ya que le gusta la vida de campo, además del ingreso económico que le genera, le permite solventar los gastos de su hogar y la educación de sus hijos. Por lo contario lo que no le gusta es el problema de la plaga que afecta sus cultivos a las que tiene que combatir, pero eso no lo desanima y tiene planes de ampliar sus cultivos, ya que piensa reforestar una extensión de su terreno con árboles maderables como la bolaina. Este será el préstamo número 5 con la institución MFP, Está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su actividad. Por otro lado se siente bien con su banco comunal pues considera a sus miembros ser buenas personas y responsables. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá para contratar personal para la nueva cosecha de naranjas que tiene en su terreno.
texts.en: Humberto, 59 years of age, is a diligent and industrious man, besides being sociable and happy.  He is married to Dora.  He lives with his last two children ages 14 and 1 years, installed conveniently in his own house.  The activity that Homberto carries out is agriculture.  For that he relies on his own land of 25 hectares in size where he sows oranges, grapefruits, lemons, tangerines, camu camu and other citrus.  (The camu camu is a fruit about the size of a large grape with purple-red skin and yellow pulp that is very high in vitamin C.)  He has been dedicated to this activity for 40 years.  He also relies on the aid of 5 laborers for the cultivation and harvesting of crops.  What he likes about this activity is to be in contact with nature since he likes life in the field.  Besides the economic income that it generates for him, it permits him to settle the expenses of his home and the education of his children.  In contrast, what he does not like is the problems of the plagues that affect his cultivations and that he must fight.  But that does not discourage him and he has plans to expand his cultivations.  He plans to reforest an extension of his land with timber-yielding trees such as the bolaina.  This will be loan number 5 with the institution MFP.  He is very pleased to know that he will have financial support, since in this way he will feel sure to advance with his activity.  On the other hand he feels good about his communal bank because he considers its members to be good and responsible people.  With the requested total of 1000 new soles, he will invest in hiring personnel for the new crop of oranges that he has on his land.

loans.use: to hire laborers.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”HUCHUY QOSQO”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Lamay en la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Luisa;  La socia tiene 27 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 3 hijos de 10, 6, 3 años de edad; la socia se trabaja asistiendo en las obras que realiza el instituto de Cultura en toda la ruta, ella encontró este trabajo y está feliz de poder aportar más en la economía de la familia, la socia también se dedica  a la ganadería y crianza de animales menores, la socia tiene toros y vacas, ella en esta ocasión desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de un torete, ella desea comprar uno para criarlo y que crezca sano y fuerte, de tal modo ella cuando este sea maduro lo puede vender o alquilar para el cruce con otra vaca y ella tener su cría. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de un torete.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "HUCHUY QOSQO” communal bank, which is located in the Lamay district in the province of Calca and department of Cusco.

The member is Señora Luisa, she is 27 years old and in a live-in relationship.  The member has three children aged 10, 6, and 3.  She is employed helping out with the works that the Institute of Culture undertakes along its entire route.  She found this employment and is happy to be able to contribute more to her family finances.  

The member also works with livestock and raising small animals.  She has bulls and cows, and on this occasion wants to invest her loan in purchasing a bullock.  She wants to purchase one in order to raise it so that it can grow healthy and strong.  In this way, once it's full-grown, she will be able to sell it or rent it for stud with another cow for breeding.  The member is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of a bullock.

The member is grateful for the loan and agrees to comply with making her repayments in accordance with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of a bullock.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma tiene 54 años D. edad, es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos. Vive en casa Propia la cual está ubicada en el Caserío la Coruña Distrito D. TambogranD., perteneciente a la Región Piura a 4 horas D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo, capital del departamento D. Lambayeque. Norma vive en la parte rural  D. este distrito pero aún no cuenta con  servicios básicos.

Norma se dedica a la crianza D. ganado porcino y aves D. corral, los cuales cría y engorda para que una vez con peso y tamaño ideal los comercializa en mercado local a sus vecinos y comerciantes que llegan al lugar. Su esposo lo apoya en las actividades que realiza.  Los ingresos que perciben les permite para solventar sus gastos personales y los D. su familia.

Norma desea comprar alimento balanceado para su ganado, esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo.  Es por ello que para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo D. 1000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa, con lo que podrá mejorar su calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Norma is 54 years old, she is in a live-in relationship and has two children.  She lives in her own home, which is located in the La Coruña hamlet in the district of Tambogrande.  This is part of the Piura region, and is four hours from the city of Chiclayo, which is the capital of the Lambayeque department.  Norma lives in the rural part of this district, and still does not have electricity or running water.

Norma works raising pigs and farmyard poultry.  She raises and fattens them until they reach an ideal weight and size to sell at the local market to her neighbors and the retailers who come there.  Her husband helps her in this work.  The income they receive allows them to cover their personal expenses and those of their family.

Norma wants to purchase balanced feed for her livestock; this investment will allow her to continue to grow her business.  It is so that she can achieve her goal, that she has seen fit to obtain a loan of 1,000 new soles from Edpyme Alternativa, with which she will be able to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy balanced animal feed for her livestock.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa nació en la ciudad de Cusco y vive en la comunidad de Pachar, ella tiene 34 años de edad y es padre y madre para sus dos hijos.  

Rosa desarrolla sus actividades cotidianas y económicas en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo, ella se dedica a la venta de choclo, venta de café, venta de sándwich en el tren que se dirige a la ciudadela de Machupicchu. Ya son varios años que se dedica al  negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

Rosa requiere el préstamo para comprar más choclos y muchas cosas más. 

Rosa se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma. Rosa pertenece al banco comunal “Inmaculada Concepción de Pachar” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Rosa was born in the city of Cusco and lives in the Pachar community.  She is 34 years old, and is both mother and father to her two children.

Rosa undertakes her daily activities and her economic activities in the city of Ollantaytambo.  She works selling corn-on-the-cob, coffee and sandwiches on the train that goes to the town of Machu Picchu.  She has been doing this for several years, and it has been going very well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her work.

Rosa is requesting the loan to purchase more corn and other additional items.

Rosa is grateful for the opportunity being provided to her by this means, and also agrees to comply with her repayments according to the repayment schedule. Rosa belongs to the “Inmaculada Concepción de Pachar” communal bank, which is part of Asociación Arariwa and is in the city of Urubamba.

loans.use: to buy more corn and other additional items.

loans.name: Edgar Benito

texts.es: EDGAR ES CASADO, TIENE 46 AÑOS DE EDAD, TIENE 3 HIJOS QUIENES ASISTEN AL COLEGIO MAS CERCANO A SU DOMICILIO, EL INICIO SU NEGOCIO HACE NUEVE AÑOS, DEBIDO  A QUE SE QUEDO DESEMPLEADO INICIO VENDIENDO PRODUCTOS LACTEOS,  LUEGO EMPEZO A VENDER CHICHARRONES EN LAS CALLES TRES DIAS A LA SEMANA POR OTRO LADO TAMBIEN SE DEDICO A LA VENTA DE PONCHOS, COLCHAS Y VAJILLAS POR PAGOS, EL SOLICITA UN CREDITO PARA PODER INVERTIR EN MAS MERCADERIA, COMO EN LA COMPRA DE PRODUCTOS DE USOS DOMESTICOS POR QUE YA SE ACERCA LA TEMPORADA NAVIDEÑA EN LA CUAL HAY MAS DEMANDA DE VENTAS, EL SUEÑO MAS GRANDE ES TERMINAR DE PAGAR SU CASA PARA DEJARLES UN LUGAR DONDE VIVIR A SUS HIJOS.
texts.en: Edgar, 46, is married and has three children who attend school near their home.  He started his business nine years ago after he lost his job and began selling dairy products.  Then he worked as a street vendor selling "chicharrones" (pork cracklings) three days a week.  He also started selling ponchos, bedspreads and dish sets.  He is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise such as home products, since the Christmas season is near and this is when demand increases.  His dream is to finish paying for his house so his children will always have a place to live.

loans.use: To buy home products to sell.

loans.name: Alberto De Jesús

texts.es: El señor Alberto a sus 40 años de edad es padre de un hijo de 17 años. El señor Alberto se dedica junto con su esposa a la venta de mercancía tal como artículos para el hogar y de uso personal. El local del señor Alberto esta ubicado en el centro de la ciudad de Medellín, gracias a que espacio público le otorgó el local donde no paga arriendo. La jornada de trabajo del señor Alberto es de 9:00 a.m. a 6:00 p.m. El señor Alberto desea comprar mercancía navideña y juguetes para suplir la demanda por temporada de fin de año. Lo anterior le permitirá mejorar sus ventas y por ende a su familia.
texts.en: Alberto is 40 years old and is the father of a 17 year old son.  Alberto and his wife sell merchandise such as household and personal use items from their location in the Medellín city center.  Thanks to the public spaces, he doesn’t have to pay rent.  Alberto works from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm.  He would like to buy Christmas merchandise and toys to meet the year end season’s demand.  This will help him increase his sales and help his family.

loans.use: to buy Christmas merchandise and toys.

loans.name: Timotea

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”HUCHUY QOSQO”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Lamay en la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Timotea;  La socia tiene 33 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 3 hijos de 15, 12, 2 años de edad; la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de animales menores, la socia  también tiene su tienda de abarrotes, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y siempre está con algún negocio en manos, ella en esta ocasión desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de animales como pollos, la socia incrementara su negocio comprando 10 pares de pollos y también comprara productos de primera necesidad, la socia comprara fideos, galletas, arroz, azúcar, leche, harinas y también en esta fecha tan especial comprara panetones. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos y paneton para implementar su tienda de abarrotes y en la compra de animales menores.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Our associate belongs to the community bank "HUCHUY QOSQO"; the bank is located in the district of Lamay in the province of Calca, department of Cusco.

Our associate's name is Timotea, she is 33 years old, has a common-law partner and three children ages, 15, 12 and two, she buys and sells small animals and also has a grocery store, she is a very hardworking woman and always has some type of business activity going on.  This time she wants to invest the loan in purchasing animals like chicken, she will grow her business by buying 10 pairs of chicken and first necessity products such as pasta, cookies, rice, sugar, milk, flour and for the special season she will also buy fruitcakes.  Our associate requests the loan to invest in products for the grocery store and to buy small animals.  She is grateful for the loan provided and commits to pay according to the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy products to supply her grocery store and to buy small animals.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa, de 39 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa,  está separada de su pareja hace 9 años, vive en compañía de sus cuatro hijos de 21, 19, 14 y 11 años de edad y una empleada del hogar, instalado cómodamente en propia casa.
El negocio de tiene Rosa es la venta ropa de diferentes modelos para damas, caballeros y niños, para lo cual viaja periódicamente a la ciudad de Lima, para luego venderlo entre sus amistades y familiares de manera personal. Tiene 16 años realizando esta actividad y paralelo a ello tiene otro negocio desde hace 3 años y consistes en la venta de comidas en un centro educativo. Lo que le gusta de su negocio es que la mantienen ocupada y la distraen, además del ingreso económico que le generará para solventar sus gastos familiares. Comenta además que gana más en la venta de ropa donde sus ganancias logran llegar hasta el 100% de lo invertido, y con sus ganancias tiene planes de invertir en  abrir una fuente de soda en su propia casa. Este será el préstamo número 2 con la institución MFP, se siente contenta con el apoyo financiero que viene recibiendo y desea seguir contando con ese apoyo, por eso dice será puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, comprará más ropa al por mayor a menor precio para tener mayores ganancias, para ésta campaña navideña.
texts.en: Rosa, 39 years of age, is a diligent and hard-working woman.  She separated from her husband 9 years ago and lives with her four children ages 21, 19, 14 and 11 and an employee of the home, installed conveniently in her own house.  Rosa's business is the sale clothes of different models for ladies, gentlemen and children, for which she travels periodically to the city of Lima, in order to sell to her friends and relatives in a personal way.  She has been carrying out this activity for 16 years and along with this she has had another business for 3 years which consists of selling food in an educational center.  What she likes about her businesses is that they keep her busy and distract her, besides the economic income that they will generate to settle her family expenses.  In addition, she tells us that she earns more in the sale of clothes where her profits manage to reach 100% of her investment, and with her profits she has plans to invest in opening a snack bar in her own house.  This will be loan number 2 with the institution MFP.  She is happy with the financial support that she is receiving and desires to continue counting on that support, therefore she says that she will be punctual in making her payments.  With the requested total of 2000 new soles, she will buy more clothes wholesale at a smaller price to have greater profits, for this Christmas campaign.

loans.use: to buy more clothing to sell.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”HUCHUY QOSQO”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Lamay en la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Lourdes;  La socia tiene 40 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 3 hijos de 17, 10, 7 años de edad; la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de animales menores, la socia cría pollos, chanchos, cuyes, ella en esta ocasión desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de pollos 10 pares y en dos semanas más comprar otros 10 pares de pollos, La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de un total de 20 pares de pollos para criarlos.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Our associate belongs to the community bank "HUCHUY QOSQO", the bank is located in the district of Lamay in the province of Calca, department of Cusco.

Our associate is Lourdes, she is 40, has a common-law partner, has three children ages 17, 10 and seven, she buys and sells small animals, raises chicken,  pigs and cuye.  This time she wants to invest the loan in buying 10 pairs of chickens and in two weeks buy 10 more pairs.  She requests a loan to invest it in the purchase of a total of 20 pairs of chicken to raise them.

Our associate is thankful for the loan and commits to make the payments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy 20 pairs of chickens to raise them.

loans.name: Jeaneth Del Carmen

texts.es:
Jeaneth, es una joven madre de 27 años de edad, emprendedora, humilde y con muchos deseos de superación, habita en La Esperanza una pequeña pero productiva comarca localizada en Yalaguina municipio de Estelí, aunque ella no es casada pero vive con el padre de su hijo. Pues fue el junto con ella que aportaron sus ahorros para iniciar su negocio de pulpería ya que en su localidad son muy pocos este tipo de negocios pero son de gran necesidad para la población su negocio ha ido creciendo poco  a poco con financiamiento  e invirtiendo en  productos de mucha necesidad de consumo para la gente.  Su expectativa es que su pulpería supla las necesidades básicas de su comarca, ampliar su inventario pues gracias a este negocio se ha podido levantar su familia y ella misma como mujer independiente. 
Ella requiere el préstamo para comprar granos básicos, galletas, pan, dulces, enlatados, sopas, aceite, jabón ,detergentes, cloro , verduras, frutas, vegetales. Uno de sus proyectos es empezar a comprar material de construcción para su vivienda pues tiene el terreno pero le hace falta material para construir poco a poco pues desea que su hijo tenga un techo digno donde vivir.
texts.en:
Jeaneth is a young mother who is 27 years of age. She is an entrepreneur who is modest, yet she has tremendous desire to succeed. Jeaneth lives in La Esperanza, a small but productive region located in Yalaguina in the town of Estelí. Even though she is not married, she lives with the father of her child. Together they gathered their savings in order to start a grocery business in their town. There are few businesses of this type that exist, but there is a great need for them. Her business has grown gradually with the help of loans and by investing in products that have high consumer demand among the public. Her expectations for her store include being able to supply the basic needs of the region and expanding her inventory. Thanks to this business, Jeaneth has been able to raise her family and become an independent woman.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy basic grains, cookies, bread, candy, canned goods, soups, oil, soap, detergents, bleach, vegetables, and fruits. One of her goals is to begin purchasing construction materials so that she can build a home. She already has the land, but is lacking the materials to proceed with gradual construction. Jeaneth wants to have a decent home where her child can live.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es:
Eusebia nació en la ciudad D. Cusco y vive en la comunidad D. Pachar, ella tiene 55 años D. edad y es casada y fruto D. unión tiene seis hijos.  

Eusebia desarrolla sus actividades cotidianas y económicas en la ciudad D. Pachar, ella se dedica a la crianza D. animales menores como gallinas y cuyes. Ya son varios años que se dedica al  negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

Eusebia requiere el préstamo para comprar más animales menores como cuyes. 

Eusebia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma. Eusebia pertenece al banco comunal “Inmaculada Concepción D. Pachar” D. la Asociación Arariwa D. la ciudad D. Urubamba.
texts.en:
Eusebia was born in the city of Cusco and lives in the community of Pachar, she is married and has six children.

Eusebia performs her daily and economic activities in the city of Pachar, she raises small animals like chickens and cuyes.  She has done this for several years and does well thanks to the effort she puts in her work.

She requests a loan to buy more small animals like cuyes.

Eusebia is thankful for the opportunity provided through this loan and is committed to make the payments according to schedule.  Eusebia belongs to the community bank " Immaculate Conception of Pachar" from the Arawiwa Association of the city of Urubamba.

loans.use: to buy small animals like cuyes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more water (by sack) and ice for her business.

loans.name: Les Militant De Ferrier 2, 4 & 5 Group

texts.fr:
Andre est le coordinateur de son groupe MILITANT DE FERRIER. Il est celibataire et  a 0 enfants.

Andre habite dans la région de  Ferrier d’Haiti où de l’éléctricité est rare et de l’eau est très limité. Andre a dirigé son  commerce de vetement pendant les 5  dernières années. Andre voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir avec produits du vetemen

Andre  dit que ses défis principal est de un grand commercant. Andre dit que son but principal son rêve est possede un bon commerce.
texts.en: Andre is the facilitator of the MILITANT DE FERRIER group.  He is single and does not have any children.  Andre lives in Haiti, in the Ferrier region, where electricity is rare and access to water is very limited.  Andre has been selling clothes for 5 years.  Andre is requesting a loan in order to invest in the clothing business.  According to Andre, his main challenge is to increase his business.  Andre says that his main goal and dream is to own a good business.

loans.use: To invest in the clothing business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to sell animals.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es:
Ernesto nació en la ciudad de Urubamba y vive en la comunidad de Pachar , él tiene 23 años de edad y es soltero aun no tiene hijos.

Ernesto desarrolla sus actividades cotidianas y económicas en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo, él se dedica a la construcción de obras y casas, él también se dedica a la venta animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y gallinas. Ya son varios años que se dedica al  negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

Ernesto requiere el préstamo para comprar más animales menores como cuyes. 

Ernesto se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma. Ernesto pertenece al banco comunal “Inmaculada Concepción de Pachar” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Ernesto was born in the city of Urubamba and lives in the community of Pachar, he is 23 years old, single and has no children.

Ernesto perform his daily and economic activities in the city of Ollantaytambo, he works in the construction of houses and other projects, he also sells small animals like cuyes and chickens.  It's been a few years since he started this business and he does well thanks to the effort he puts in his work.

Ernesto needs the loan to buy more small animals like cuyes.

Ernesto is thankful for the opportunity provided through this loan and commits to make the repayments according to schedule.  Ernesto belongs to the community bank "Immaculate Conception of Pachar" from the Arariwa Association in the city of Urubamba.

loans.use: to buy small animals like cuyes.
